com.persistit

Class KeyParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.persistit.KeyParser

  • public class KeyParser
extends Object
    Parses String values as Key or KeyFilter values.
    Version:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyParser(String source)
      Construct a KeyParser for the specified string.
      KeyParser(String source, int offset, int size)
      Construct a KeyParser for a substring of the specified string.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getIndex()
      Return the current index for parsing.
      boolean parseKey(Key key)
      Parse a key value from the string or substring from which this KeyParser was constructed, modifying the supplied Key to contain the result.
      KeyFilter parseKeyFilter()
      Parse and returns a KeyFilter from the string or substring from which this KeyParser was constructed.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • KeyParser

        public KeyParser(String source)
        Construct a KeyParser for the specified string.
        Parameters:
        source - The string to be parsed.

      • KeyParser

        public KeyParser(String source,
         int offset,
         int size)
        Construct a KeyParser for a substring of the specified string.
        Parameters:
        source - The string
        offset - Offset of the first character of the substring to parse
        size - Size of the substring

    • Method Detail

      • parseKey

        public boolean parseKey(Key key)
        Parse a key value from the string or substring from which this KeyParser was constructed, modifying the supplied Key to contain the result.
        Returns:
        true if the key value was parsed successfully. false if the string or substring was invalid as a string representation of a Key.

      • parseKeyFilter

        public KeyFilter parseKeyFilter()
        Parse and returns a KeyFilter from the string or substring from which this KeyParser was constructed.
        Returns:
        A KeyFilter or null if the string or substring was invalid as a string representation of a KeyFilter.

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex()
        Return the current index for parsing. This indicates the first character that did not conform
        Returns:
        The index
